problem.title: CheckPoint: Energy in SHM
problem.p: A block, attached to a spring, follows simple harmonic motion as shown in the diagram.
Which of the following statements about the energy of this system are true? In the options below, K stands for kinetic energy and U stands for potential energy. Check all that apply.

choice.text: K is directly proportional to the displacement from equilibrium
K is inversely proportional to the displacement from equilibrium
K is directly proportional to the square of the displacement from equilibrium
U is directly proportional to the displacement from equilibrium
U is inversely proportional to the displacement from equilibrium
U is directly proportional to the square of the displacement from equilibrium
K is at a maximum when the acceleration is zero
K is at a minimum when U is at a maximum
U is at a maximum when the acceleration is at a maximum
U is at a minimum when the velocity is zero
The sum (K+U) is directly proportional to the displacement from equilibrium
The sum (K+U) is inversely proportional to the displacement from equilibrium
The sum (K+U) is directly proportional to the acceleration
The sum (K+U) is inversely proportional to the acceleration
